Melanoma.description: Melanoma is a serious form of skin cancer. Immediate medical attention is required.
Melanoma.caution: High risk. Consult a dermatologist immediately.

Squamous cell carcinoma.description: A type of skin cancer that requires medical treatment.
Squamous cell carcinoma.caution: High risk. Consult a dermatologist immediately.

Actinic keratosis.description: A precancerous skin condition caused by sun exposure.
remedies: Apply moisturizers to keep skin hydrated.
Actinic keratosis.caution: Moderate risk. Consult a dermatologist if condition worsens.

Atopic Dermatitis.description: A chronic skin condition causing itchy and inflamed skin.
remedies: Avoid triggers like harsh soaps and detergents.
Atopic Dermatitis.caution: Low risk. Consult a dermatologist if symptoms persist.
